Column.Name: Validation
Column.ValidationFormula:
LET $action := EACH [Action RecordID]; LET $modes := EACH [Mode];
RETURN IF( [Edit] = TRUE, "Confirm order of actions",
[Temp - Status] = "Active", IF( [Set Name] = NULL, "A set name must be provided",
ARRAY_INDEXOF($action, NULL) > 0, "All action must be defined",
OR( ARRAY_INDEXOF($modes, "Setting Up") > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF($modes, "Add New") > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF($modes, "Add Existing") > 0, ), "All action must be defined",
[Edit] = TRUE, "Confirm order of actions" ) )

Column.Name: Mode
Column.Formula: IF( [Action RecordID] <> NULL, NULL, AND( [Mode] <> "Add Existing", [Mode] <> "Add New", [Action Exists] = TRUE, [Action RecordID] = NULL ), "Setting Up", [Mode] )

Column.Name: Action Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Action name cannot be empty - provide a name to the action or remove the action" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

Label.Text: Give a name to this set

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

Actions sets are collections of actions that can be grouped together and templated to form part of a broader process

"

Label.Text: Set must be active to become available to select within processes
Cannot make changes while status is Active
Give a name to this set

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

Actions sets are collections of actions that can be grouped together and templated to form part of a broader process

"

LET $editing := ARRAY_WHERE(EACH[Mode], $(i, item) OR($item = "Add New", $item = "Setting Up"));
RETURN AND( ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action RecordID]) > 1, [Edit] <> TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH($editing) <= 0 )
AND( [Action RecordID] = NULL, OR( [Mode] = "Setting Up", [Mode] = NULL ) )
AND( [Action RecordID] = NULL, OR( [Mode] = "Setting Up", [Mode] = NULL ) )

IF( [LineNumber] = 1, AND( [Action RecordID] <> NULL, [Mode] <> "Setting Up" ),
TRUE )
AND( [Edit] = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action RecordID]) > 1, [Action Sequence] < ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH[Action Sequence]) )
AND( [Edit] = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action RecordID]) > 1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH[Action Sequence]) = [Action Sequence] )

Label.Text:
This will delete this set. It will not be lost in any existing Action records.
This will not delete the actions related to this, if the actions are referenced on any other sets they will be preserved.
